message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with an offer of $12,000 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $12,000 is a bit outside my budget.  I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  This is my best offer.

Bob, I understand that $8,500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering $10,500 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for both of us.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still a bit high for me.  I'm confident that we can find a price that works for both of us.  I'll offer $9,000 for the product.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Bob, I understand that $9,000 is still a bit lower than I'd like, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering $10,000 for the product, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept. I'm hoping we can meet at this price.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $10,000 is still more than I can afford right now.  I'm willing to go up to $9,500 for the product.  This is a fair price that considers both our needs and allows us to close the deal.
